## vision\_v1.Schema$Feature interface

The type of Google Cloud Vision API detection to perform, and the maximum number of results to return for that type. Multiple `Feature` objects can be specified in the `features` list.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Schema$Feature 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [maxResults](./vision.vision_v1.schema_feature.maxresults.md) | number \| null | Maximum number of results of this type. Does not apply to <code>TEXT_DETECTION</code>, <code>DOCUMENT_TEXT_DETECTION</code>, or <code>CROP_HINTS</code>. |
|  [model](./vision.vision_v1.schema_feature.model.md) | string \| null | Model to use for the feature. Supported values: "builtin/stable" (the default if unset) and "builtin/latest". |
|  [type](./vision.vision_v1.schema_feature.type.md) | string \| null | The feature type. |
